attributes.action: Make it 21 to buy a knife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I know it has only just gone up to 18 but things aren't getting any better!

Make the Law 21 to be able to buy a knife.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/21TOBUYKNIFE/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
